name: Coffee Run (itch) (Shoe)
description:
Hello! This will be the first game jam I am competing in and my first ever game project that I am sharing with others, I hope you enjoy!

The game is about a robot named Sean, who was designed and created by an unknown scientist as a prototype for his CoffeeRobo5000.

This robot is designed to transport Coffee from a Cafe toVIP Customers homes.  However, he was thrown away as soon as this unknown scientist had finished building the  official version of the CoffeeRobo5000.

Sean was still alive though, and decided to get a job of his own, however as he was only a prototype, his system weren't fully refined, so no Cafe would take his on as an employee. However, one Cafe finally accepted him, Costo Coffe.

Your goal in this game is to assist Sean on delivering the coffee to their VIP customers houses by helping his keep the coffee stabalised on the platform. Good luck and I hope you enjoy!
